component.name: Drill
component.summary: Search files without indexing, but clever crawling

description.p: At least 1 thread per mount point. Use as much RAM as possible for caching stuff. Try to avoid "black hole folders" using a regex based blocklist in which the crawler will never come out and never scan useful files (node_modules,Windows,etc). Intended for desktop users, no obscure Linux files and system files scans. Use priority lists to first scan important folders. Betting on the future: slowly being optimized for SSDs/M.2 or fast RAID arrays.
